title: I can't update my client because of an error, and nw i can't play HELP!
body:
So today I wanted to play a game of league and a message saying...

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\BugSplat.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact administer or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc000012f.

I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling already but it always reverts to the old client, and when I try to launch the program the message still comes up every time. Help?

replies.body: Sounds like that BugSplat.dll is trying to open to show an error, but it turns out that the dll itself is having some sort of problem. Try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running it with the reinstall option to see if we can get those files cleaned up.

hey, I had the same problem, I deleted the whole riot games folder and uninstalled EVEYTHING to do with league from my computer and relaunched the downloader. The new client opened right up and is now loading. If this doesn't work, try this link:
http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=952764
